Paragraph: 2-12 Nevertheless , the poor sunlight harvesting efficiency and low charge carrier mobility of organic semiconducting materials still hinder the further efficiency improvement of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| organic semiconducting materials |

Note: I have removed "poor sunlight harvesting efficiency" and "low charge carrier mobility" as they are properties of materials, not the materials themselves.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 2-12 Nevertheless , the poor sunlight harvesting efficiency and low charge carrier mobility of organic semiconducting materials still hinder the further efficiency improvement of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| poor sunlight harvesting efficiency |
| low charge carrier mobility |

The two entities identified as "Property Name" in the paragraph are "poor sunlight harvesting efficiency" and "low charge carrier mobility". These are both properties of organic semiconducting materials that are hindering the efficiency improvement of Perovskite Solar Cells (PSCs).
